snippet: Investing $5 billion in the fight against extremists sounds sensible, but the new program seems too heavily dependent on military responses.
abstract: Editorial raises concerns about Pres Obama's plan to make major investment of $5 billion so that other countries can help in fight against extremists; contends plan seems too heavily dependent on military responses; maintains experience in Iraq underscores need for investment in community projects, education and moderate groups that build civil society and discourage extremism.
